story.storykicker: Bangalore University has invited applications from interested, eligible candidates to apply for its Integrated PG programmes. The last date for submission of application is June 24.
story.storybody:
Bangalore University has invited applications from interested, eligible candidates to apply for its five years Integrated Bachelor of Science Master of Science (B.Sc-M.Sc) in Biological Sciences and Integrated Masters of Business Management Studies (BMS-MMS) programmes for the commencing academic session 2016 to 2017.

Eligibility criteria

Educational qualification:

The candidates interested in applying for this programme must have completed two-year pre-university science course of Karnataka state or equivalent thereto and must have secured at least 50 per cent of marks in an aggregate of all papers studied at the qualifying examination.

Selection procedure

The admission for this course will be made on the basis of counselling. Preference will be given to Karnataka students with domicile. Those who are desirous of admission and listed in the eligible list should attend the counselling on the specified time and place without fail.

How to apply

The candidates are required to download the application form from the university website www.bangaloreuniversity.ac.in. The duly filled application form along with attested copies of marks cards , necessary documents and a DD of Rs 400 (Rs 200 for SC/ST/CAT-1 candidates) should be submitted to the co-ordinators of respective courses mentioned in the official advertisement.

Important dates

The last date for submission of application is June 24.

The last date for submission of application with late fee of Rs 100 is June 30.

Read: Willing to do Doctorate of Philosophy (PhD): Take admission in RGNIYD

Read: NIT Manipur admissions 2016: Apply for M.Tech courses

For information on more courses and admissions, click here.
